elements.name: User adds MLM product to the cart

steps.name: the user is on the homepage
the user clicks the cart icon

steps.name: the user navigates to Golf > Mobile Launch Monitor
the page title should contain "Launch Monitor"
the user clicks Add to Cart
the user should be redirected to the cart screen
the product price should match the previous screen
the user increases the quantity to 2
the quantity of the third item should be "2"
the total price should be correct
